summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Awesome Life Habits app. All core features functional with excellent backend-frontend integration. AI Coach, voice commands, focus exercises, and habit tracking working perfectly.
passed_tests: All 6 pages load successfully (Home, Habits, Focus, Education, Community, AI Coach)
Add Habit modal - create habits successfully
Habit completion checkbox and streak updates
Focus exercises - all 3 types work (flower, expanding circle, breath counter)
AI Coach chat - send messages and receive responses
Voice command button visible on all pages
Habits page search, grid/list view, bulk log
Backend API - all 16 endpoints working (habits CRUD, logging, community, AI chat, stats, challenges)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core features working, only dark mode toggle missing)
